entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
